text: Headbangers Ball is a television program about heavy metal and hardcore punk music airing on MTV2, and other channels. ==Other websites== * Official show sites ** United States – Official blog ** UK ** Denmark ** Finland ** Sweden ** Australia * Myspace site * Official site for albums spawned from Headbangers Ball * ** * Jump The Shark – Headbangers Ball * Headbangers Ball Tribute Site Category:Music television series Category:English-language television programs
title: Headbangers Ball
